MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon, affecting properties in Llanberis and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:57PM. Our engineers are on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by broken overhead line equipment. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:13PM on 14th February 2021.
